long_description: A versatile pair of running shorts from Moving Comfort, the Dash shorts for women are a stretch-woven wonder that makes any workout more comfortable. Quick-drying and moisture-wicking fabric in outer shorts and liner help keep you comfortable, and fabric offers a UPF rating of 50+. Wide waistband with hidden pocket and infinity stretch drawcord dials in the fit. Security zip pocket at right back. The semifitted Moving Comfort Dash Shorts for women feature a mid-rise and 4 in. inseam.
short_description: A versatile pair of running shorts from Moving Comfort, the Dash shorts for women are a stretch-woven wonder that makes any workout more comfortable.
